cast.overview: Hallie Parker and Annie James are identical twins who were separated at a young age due to their parents' divorce. Unbeknownst to their parents, the girls are sent to the same summer camp, where they meet, discover the truth about their relationship, and come up with a plan to switch places in an effort to reunite their mother and father.
cast.title: The Parent Trap

details.biography: Donata Melina Nicolette "Dina" Lohan (born September 15, 1962) is an American television personality and producer, who rose to fame as the mother and manager of actress Lindsay Lohan. She is also the mother of Michael Jr., Aliana and Dokota Lohan.  Dina was previously married to American actor Michael Lohan (1985-2007) and has four children.
details.name: Dina Lohan
details.place_of_birth: New York City, New York, USA
